name: Hidden Obstacles
description:
This game was made for the ZenoJam where you had 2 days to make a game with the topic "Now you see me yow you don't". (I had only one day because the other day i worked on a completly different topic and realised it too late...)

Change sound and music settings with the settings button.

Press space or click to jump.

Memorize where the hole is, the obstacles will hide.

Change your collour with left and right arrow.

Change difficulty with the butten in the top right corner.

Don't press the button in the down right corner.
